Key Match Events: The Wizards allowed the Magic to grab 15 offensive rebounds, which pointed to a big reason behind the loss.
Pre-Game Insights: Wizards coach Brian Keefe emphasized the importance of establishing the game and not giving up offensive rebounds.
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Keefe said the team tried to do the right thing in the first half but struggled in the second half. Bilal Coulibaly shared the same sentiments, saying they were slower and had poor execution in the second half.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Wizards will focus on rebounding, especially on offense, when they take on the Houston Rockets tonight.
Others: The Wizards lost 121-94 to the Orlando Magic, and the game changed in the third quarter.
